channel.title: Out of memory, but i don't use vps?
channel.description: hey guys, i was running my server last night and it gave me an error jana.lang.outofmemoryerror saying its out of memory but i don't run it of vpsland or what ever. please help im using pi

item.title: Out of memory, but i don't use vps?
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:3, topic:393578”]note, this is the first time it’s happened i think

@echo off title server "C:\glassfish3\jdk\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/quote]
looked over ur batch doesnt look like anythings wrong

@echo off "C:\glassfish3\jdk\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server exit
updated a few things thou.

Read full topic
